title.rendered: Sonakshi Sinha and Palladium Mall support She Can Fly

content.rendered:
Bollywood actress Sonakshi Sinha celebrated the 9th Anniversary of Palladium with Smile Foundation kids, which was held at Lower Parel in Mumbai. The actress along with Palladium Mall supported S,mile Foundation’s Campaign for education of girl children SheCanFly. The kids were overjoyed to meet the actress and made beautiful cards for the actress.

A question answer session was also conducted wherein the kids asked various questions to the actress about her childhood and dreams. Sonakshi answered the questions and said she loved to go to school and loved to play sports. Speaking about the event Sonakshi said, “I think it is a fantastic initiative. Whatever little we can do on our end to help the kids should be done.” The kids also sang a song with the actress.
